title: Lingonberry (Vaccinium vitis-idaea)
name: lingonberry
rationale: LightGBM and Random Forests performed similarly. We selected Random Forests for the lower computational demands.
description: The lingonberry diagnostic species set consists only of Vaccinium vitis-idaea L. Vaccinium vitis-idaea is common and widespread throughout the map domain. Although it rarely dominates or co-dominates plant communities, it occurs in a wide variety of communities at low to moderate abundances. This species is also commonly known as lowbush cranberry.
